member.name: T:SteamdotNet.Common.SteamAppsParameters
member.summary: Contains the parameters for the ISteamApps interface. It encapsulates the parameters for each method in structs.

member.name: T:SteamdotNet.Common.SteamBaseParameters
member.summary: This struct contains the three common parameters that can be used in all of the methods of all interfaces of the Steam Web API.

member.name: T:SteamdotNet.ISteamApps
member.summary: Holds the same methods as the ISteamApps interface from the Steam Web API.

member.summary: Holds all the base methods for all parsers.

member.name: T:SteamdotNet.Parsing.JSONParser
member.summary: First rudimentary implementation of a JSON parser, reading a JSON file from a REST service.

member.summary: Parses a JSON from a service call to a given object type.

member.name: T:SteamdotNet.SteamdotNetFactory
member.summary: Factory pattern. All object are created through this class.

member.name: M:SteamdotNet.SteamdotNetFactory.CreateBaseParameters
member.summary: Factory method. It creates a SteamBaseParameters object with its values read from the configuration.

All the required and optional parameters
member.returns: Complete URL to perform a method call
